channel.title: Cursor not showing?
channel.description:
Hi, ive got a slight problem on my client and i really need to fix it as many players think the passwords wont work and are leaving them blank.
So how can i get the cursor to show ? It shows on the username field but not password.
And
How can i make it so people have to have a password ?
Ive done some searching but cant find anything :(
Thanks Brendan
